text: Diogo Costa Pinto (born 29 June 1999) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for Italian club Potenza in Serie C on loan from Ascoli as a midfielder. ==Football career== Born in Tomar, Pinto made his professional debut with Benfica B in a 4–0 away loss to Vilafranquense in LigaPro on 18 August 2019. On 13 January 2020 he was acquired by Ascoli. On 5 October 2020 he joined Serie C club Potenza on loan. ==References== ==External links== * * *National team data Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tomar Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:U.F.C.I. title: Diogo Pinto (footballer)
